title: scanvi
description: Semi-supervised model for single-cell transcriptomics data. A scVI extension that can leverage the cell type knowledge for a subset of the cells present in the data sets to infer the states of the rest of the cells.

Dataset input.title: Dataset input
Dataset input.description: Dataset input using nf-tower "dataset" or "data explorer". Allows for the input of multiple         parameter sets to initialise a Nextflow channel.

param_list.description: Dataset input can either be a list of maps, a csv file, a json file, a yaml file, or simply a yaml                 blob. The names of the input fields (e.g. csv columns, json keys) need to be an exact match with the workflow input parameters.

inputs.title: Inputs
inputs.description: Arguments related to the input (aka query) dataset.

input.description: Type: `file`, required, example: `input.h5mu`. Input h5mu file
input.help_text: Type: `file`, required, example: `input.h5mu`. Input h5mu file.

modality.description: Type: `string`, default: `rna`. Which modality to process
modality.help_text: Type: `string`, default: `rna`. Which modality to process.

var_input_gene_names.help_text: Type: `string`. .var field containing the gene names, if the .var index is not to be used.

output.description: Type: `file`, required, default: `$id.$key.output.h5mu`, example: `output.h5mu`. Output h5mu file
output.help_text: Type: `file`, required, default: `$id.$key.output.h5mu`, example: `output.h5mu`. Output h5mu file.

output_model.description: Type: `file`, default: `$id.$key.output_model.output_model`, example: `model_dir`. Folder where the state of the trained model will be saved to
output_model.help_text: Type: `file`, default: `$id.$key.output_model.output_model`, example: `model_dir`. Folder where the state of the trained model will be saved to.

output_obs_predictions.help_text: Type: `string`, default: `scanvi_pred`. In which `.obs` slots to store the predicted information.

output_obs_probability.help_text: Type: `string`, default: `scanvi_probability`. In which `.obs` slots to store the probability of the predictions.

output_obsm_scanvi_embedding.help_text: Type: `string`, default: `scanvi_embedding`. In which `.obsm` slots to store the scvi embedding.

unknown_celltype.description: Type: `string`, default: `Unknown`. Label for unknown cell types
unknown_celltype.help_text: Type: `string`, default: `Unknown`. Label for unknown cell types.

reference model.title: Reference model
reference model.description: Arguments related to the reference model.

scvi_reference_model.description: Type: `file`, example: `scvi_model.pt`. Pretrained SCVI reference model to initialize the SCANVI model with
scvi_reference_model.help_text: Type: `file`, example: `scvi_model.pt`. Pretrained SCVI reference model to initialize the SCANVI model with. The model needs to include the AnnData object used to trained the model stored.

scanvi_reference_model.description: Type: `file`, example: `scvi_model.pt`. Pretrained SCANVI reference model
scanvi_reference_model.help_text: Type: `file`, example: `scvi_model.pt`. Pretrained SCANVI reference model.

scanvi reference model training argument.title: SCANVI reference model training arguments
scanvi reference model training argument.description: Arguments related to the reference SCANVI model.

reference_train_size.description: Type: `double`, default: `0.9`. Size of training set
reference_train_size.help_text: Type: `double`, default: `0.9`. Size of training set.

reference_max_epochs.description: Type: `integer`, default: `400`. Maximum number of epochs
reference_max_epochs.help_text: Type: `integer`, default: `400`. Maximum number of epochs.

reference_reduce_lr_on_plateau.description: Type: `boolean`, default: `true`. Reduce learning rate on plateau
reference_reduce_lr_on_plateau.help_text: Type: `boolean`, default: `true`. Reduce learning rate on plateau.

reference_lr_patience.description: Type: `integer`, default: `25`. Patience for learning rate reduction
reference_lr_patience.help_text: Type: `integer`, default: `25`. Patience for learning rate reduction.

reference_lr_factor.description: Type: `double`, default: `0.5`. Factor by which to reduce learning rate
reference_lr_factor.help_text: Type: `double`, default: `0.5`. Factor by which to reduce learning rate.

reference_early_stopping_patience.description: Type: `integer`, default: `50`. Patience for early stopping
reference_early_stopping_patience.help_text: Type: `integer`, default: `50`. Patience for early stopping.

scanvi query model training arguments.title: SCANVI query model training arguments
scanvi query model training arguments.description: Arguments related to the query SCANVI model.

query_train_size.description: Type: `double`, default: `0.9`. Size of training set
query_train_size.help_text: Type: `double`, default: `0.9`. Size of training set.

query_max_epochs.description: Type: `integer`, default: `400`. Maximum number of epochs
query_max_epochs.help_text: Type: `integer`, default: `400`. Maximum number of epochs.

query_reduce_lr_on_plateau.description: Type: `boolean`, default: `true`. Reduce learning rate on plateau
query_reduce_lr_on_plateau.help_text: Type: `boolean`, default: `true`. Reduce learning rate on plateau.

query_lr_patience.description: Type: `integer`, default: `25`. Patience for learning rate reduction
query_lr_patience.help_text: Type: `integer`, default: `25`. Patience for learning rate reduction.

query_lr_factor.description: Type: `double`, default: `0.5`. Factor by which to reduce learning rate
query_lr_factor.help_text: Type: `double`, default: `0.5`. Factor by which to reduce learning rate.

query_early_stopping_patience.description: Type: `integer`, default: `50`. Patience for early stopping
query_early_stopping_patience.help_text: Type: `integer`, default: `50`. Patience for early stopping.

nextflow input-output arguments.title: Nextflow input-output arguments
nextflow input-output arguments.description: Input/output parameters for Nextflow itself. Please note that both publishDir and publish_dir are supported but at least one has to be configured.

publish_dir.description: Type: `string`, required, example: `output/`. Path to an output directory
publish_dir.help_text: Type: `string`, required, example: `output/`. Path to an output directory.
